participant_1.background:
I spend too much time playing with my cat, Leroy Jenkins.
my lifes passion is designer french fries.
My father doesn't approve of my music.
I am a cat lover who enjoys making organic cat food for my furry friend.
I bought a card for my first crush on Valentine's Day.

participant_2.background:
I'm proud of my work as an upholsterer and the commissions I've received from comic book artists.
I am a healthy person, except for my love of milk.
my father was a cook.
through them i have learned to make up myself and others.
I was a librarian, but I lost my job because I was always forgetting where I put things.

content.text: Hey there! How are you doing today?
Doing well, thanks!  What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy making up stories and making things. I do a lot of upholstering work.
That's awesome! I'm not really crafty at all. I like to play with my cat, Leroy Jenkins.
I love cats! What kind of cat is Leroy?
He's a domestic shorthair tabby.  He's super friendly and loves to play fetch.
That sounds like a great cat!  I'm allergic to cats, but I love them from a distance.
That's too bad! They're the best pets.  What's your favorite thing to make up stories about?
I like to make up stories about superheroes and villains. I also like to make up stories about my life.
That sounds really cool! I'm not much of a writer, but I love reading.
I love reading too! I read a lot of comic books, graphic novels, and science fiction.
I love graphic novels too!  Have you read the Sandman series?
No, I haven't! I've heard good things about it, though.
It's one of my favorite series! It's a great story about dreams and the Endless.
That sounds really interesting! I'll have to check it out.
You should!  It's a great series.
